ygData.subject: Re: what server should i ping
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The 2nd one. There s an article detailing the structure of the everquest zone, and notably all the servers. But you can t ping and tracert up to any of
ygData.messageBody:
According to St Nick:
> From: St Nick <roeelf@...>
>
>
> The only one i was succesful in pinging:
>
> everquest.chat.com
> or
> chat.everquest.com
>
> memmory is failing me which is the right one

The 2nd one. There's an article detailing the structure of the everquest zone,
and notably all the servers. But you can't ping and tracert up to any of them,
they're all firewalled (well, IP filtered).

> > Do any one what the URL are to the server that you
> > can do a tracert and Ping to to see you connection ?

I suppose you want eqmon. A search thru altavista should give resusts.
